title: Find Dirt

title: Playwize

title: JioWorks

title: JioCampaign

title: illPeopleMusic

title: Incyte Commercial

title: Povorcitinib Clinical Trial
contributions: Security-first development: authentication hardening, encryption at rest/in-transit, role-based access; clinical dashboards.
